verses.verse: It <S%H2985>happened,<s%> when Jabin <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H2674>Hazor<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> of <S%H7971>it,<s%> that he sent to <S%H3103>Jobab<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4068>Madon,<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H8110>Shimron,<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H407>Achshaph,<s%>

and to the <S%H4428>kings<s%> who were on the <S%H6828>north,<s%> in the hill <S%H2022>country,<s%> in the <S%H6160>Arabah<s%> <S%H5045>south<s%> of <S%H3672>Chinneroth,<s%> in the <S%H8219>lowland,<s%> and in the <S%H5299>heights<s%> of <S%H1756>Dor<s%> on the <S%H3220>west,<s%>

to the <S%H3669>Canaanite<s%> on the <S%H4217>east<s%> and on the <S%H3220>west,<s%> and the <S%H567>Amorite,<s%> and the <S%H2850>Hittite,<s%> and the <S%H6522>Perizzite,<s%> and the <S%H2983>Jebusite<s%> in the hill <S%H2022>country,<s%> and the <S%H2340>Hivite<s%> under <S%H2768>Hermon<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4709>Mizpah.<s%>

They went <S%H3318>out,<s%> they and all their <S%H4264>armies<s%> with <S%H7227>them,<s%> many <S%H5971>people,<s%> even as the <S%H2344>sand<s%> that is on <S%H3220>the<s%> <S%H8193>seashore<s%> in <S%H7230>multitude,<s%> with <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5483>horses<s%> and <S%H7393>chariots.<s%>

All these <S%H4428>kings<s%> met <S%H3259>together;<s%> and they <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> <S%H3259>together<s%> at the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H4792>Merom,<s%> to <S%H3898>fight<s%> with <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> <S%H3372>"Don't<s%> be afraid <S%H6440>because<s%> of <S%H4279>them;<s%> for tomorrow at this <S%H6256>time,<s%> I will deliver them <S%H5414>up<s%> all <S%H2491>slain<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> You shall <S%H6131>hamstring<s%> their <S%H5483>horses<s%> and <S%H8313>burn<s%> their <S%H4818>chariots<s%> with <S%H784>fire.<s%>"

So <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H935>came,<s%> and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%> with <S%H4325>him,<s%> against them by the waters of <S%H4792>Merom<s%> <S%H6597>suddenly,<s%> and fell on <S%H5307>them.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5414>delivered<s%> them into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and they <S%H5221>struck<s%> <S%H7291>them,<s%> and chased them to <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H6721>Sidon,<s%> and to Misrephoth <S%H4956>Maim,<s%> and to the <S%H1237>valley<s%> of <S%H4708>Mizpeh<s%> <S%H4217>eastward.<s%> They <S%H5221>struck<s%> them until they <S%H7604>left<s%> them none <S%H8300>remaining.<s%>

<S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> to them as <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>told<s%> <S%H6131>him.<s%> He hamstrung their <S%H5483>horses<s%> and <S%H8313>burnt<s%> their <S%H4818>chariots<s%> with <S%H784>fire.<s%>

<S%H3091>Joshua<s%> turned <S%H7725>back<s%> at that <S%H6256>time,<s%> and <S%H3920>took<s%> <S%H2674>Hazor,<s%> and <S%H5221>struck<s%> its <S%H4428>king<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword:<s%> for <S%H2674>Hazor<s%> <S%H6440>used<s%> to be the <S%H7218>head<s%> of all those <S%H4467>kingdoms.<s%>

They <S%H5221>struck<s%> all the <S%H5315>souls<s%> who were in it with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> utterly <S%H2763>destroying<s%> <S%H3498>them.<s%> There was no one left who <S%H5397>breathed.<s%> He <S%H8313>burnt<s%> <S%H2674>Hazor<s%> with <S%H784>fire.<s%>

<S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H3920>captured<s%> all the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of those <S%H4428>kings,<s%> with their <S%H4428>kings,<s%> and he <S%H5221>struck<s%> them with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and utterly <S%H2763>destroyed<s%> <S%H4872>them;<s%> as Moses the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6680>commanded.<s%>

But as for the <S%H5892>cities<s%> that <S%H5975>stood<s%> on their <S%H8510>mounds,<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H8313>burned<s%> none of <S%H2108>them,<s%> except <S%H2674>Hazor<s%> <S%H3091>only.<s%> Joshua burned <S%H8313>that.<s%>

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> took all the <S%H7998>spoil<s%> of these <S%H5892>cities,<s%> with the <S%H929>livestock,<s%> as <S%H962>spoils<s%> for <S%H120>themselves;<s%> but every man they <S%H5221>struck<s%> with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> until they had <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> <S%H7604>them.<s%> They didn't leave any who <S%H5397>breathed.<s%>

As <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> his <S%H5650>servant,<s%> so <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua.<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H5493>so.<s%> He left <S%H1697>nothing<s%> <S%H5493>undone<s%> of all that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

So <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H3947>captured<s%> all that <S%H776>land,<s%> the hill <S%H5045>country,<s%> all the <S%H5045>South,<s%> all the <S%H5045>land<s%> of <S%H1657>Goshen,<s%> the <S%H8219>lowland,<s%> the <S%H6160>Arabah,<s%> the <S%H2022>hill<s%> country of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and the lowland of the <S%H8219>same;<s%>

from <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H2510>Halak,<s%> that goes <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H8165>Seir,<s%> even to Baal <S%H1171>Gad<s%> in the <S%H1237>valley<s%> of <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%> under <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H2768>Hermon.<s%> He <S%H3920>took<s%> all their <S%H4428>kings,<s%> <S%H5221>struck<s%> <S%H4191>them,<s%> and put them to death.
<S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H4421>war<s%> a <S%H7227>long<s%> <S%H3117>time<s%> with all those <S%H4428>kings.<s%>

There was not a <S%H5892>city<s%> that made <S%H7999>peace<s%> with the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> except the <S%H2340>Hivites,<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H1391>Gibeon.<s%> They <S%H3947>took<s%> all in <S%H4421>battle.<s%>

For it was of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> to <S%H2388>harden<s%> their <S%H3820>hearts,<s%> to come <S%H7125>against<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in <S%H4421>battle,<s%> that he might <S%H2763>utterly<s%> destroy <S%H8467>them,<s%> that they might have no favor, but that he might <S%H8045>destroy<s%> <S%H3068>them,<s%> as Yahweh <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

<S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> at that <S%H6256>time,<s%> and cut <S%H3772>off<s%> the <S%H6062>Anakim<s%> from the hill <S%H2022>country,<s%> from <S%H2275>Hebron,<s%> from <S%H1688>Debir,<s%> from <S%H6024>Anab,<s%> and from all the hill <S%H2022>country<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and from all the hill <S%H2022>country<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H2763>utterly<s%> destroyed them with their <S%H5892>cities.<s%>

There were none of the <S%H6062>Anakim<s%> <S%H3498>left<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> Only in <S%H5804>Gaza,<s%> in <S%H1661>Gath,<s%> and in <S%H795>Ashdod,<s%> did some <S%H7604>remain.<s%>

So <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the whole <S%H776>land,<s%> according to all that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses;<s%> and <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> it for an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> to <S%H3478>Israel<s%> according to their <S%H4256>divisions<s%> by their <S%H7626>tribes.<s%> The <S%H776>land<s%> had <S%H8252>rest<s%> from <S%H4421>war.<s%>
